blocks:
endcase
    end

FIRST_DYN_CAL:  begin 
          First_Dyn_Cal_Done  <= 1'b1;          
          STATE               <= START_DYN_CAL;
        end

WAIT8:  begin             
          if (!IODRPCTRLR_RDY_BUSY_N)
            STATE <= WAIT8;
          else begin
            if (First_In_Term_Done) begin
              STATE               <= START_DYN_CAL; 
            end
            else begin
              STATE               <= WRITE_CALIBRATE; 
            end
          end
        end
        RST_DELAY:  begin     
          if (Block_Reset) begin
assign Inc_Flag = (TARGET_DQS_DELAY > DQS_DELAY);
assign Dec_Flag = (TARGET_DQS_DELAY < DQS_DELAY);
assign pre_sysrst_minpulse_width_ok = pre_sysrst_cnt[3];

always @ (posedge UI_CLK or posedge non_violating_rst ) begin  
  if (non_violating_rst)          
    RST_reg <= 1'b1;                                       
  else if (~WAIT_200us_COUNTER[15])
    RST_reg <= 1'b1;         
  else 
    RST_reg     <= rst_tmp; 
    
end

always @ (posedge UI_CLK or posedge RST ) begin  
  if (RST) begin         
    Block_Reset <= 1'b0;
    RstCounter  <= 10'b0;
end
  else begin
    Block_Reset <= 1'b0;                   
    if (Pre_SYSRST)
      RstCounter  <= RST_CNT;              
    else begin
      if (RstCounter < TZQINIT_MAXCNT) begin 
        Block_Reset <= 1'b1;               
        RstCounter  <= RstCounter + 1'b1;  
      end
    end
  end
end
assign MCB_SYSRST = (Pre_SYSRST );
assign non_violating_rst = RST & Rst_condition1;
assign rst_tmp    = (~PLL_LOCK_R2 && ~SELFREFRESH_MODE);

generate
if( C_MEM_TYPE != "DDR2") begin : gen_cketrain_b
endgenerate

generate
if( C_MEM_TYPE == "DDR2") begin : gen_cketrain_a

always @ (posedge UI_CLK)
     DONE_SOFTANDHARD_CAL    <= ((DQS_DELAY_INITIAL != 8'h00) || (STATE == DONE)) && MCB_UODONECAL;
